summary: This document appears to be text message or email correspondence from August 15, 2019, discussing alleged financial misconduct related to a real estate transaction, involving attorneys who allegedly facilitated fraud by delaying mortgage filings and misappropriating EB-5 investment funds through various LLCs.

persons.name: Les Evans
persons.context: Served as both the buyer's attorney and the title company; allegedly collaborated with Craig to delay mortgage filing to mislead investors about the property being unencumbered.

persons.name: Craig
persons.context: Allegedly formed multiple LLCs, including one for a boat alibi to misappropriate funds from hotel/EB-5 funds, and another to buy property behind the hotel with another investor.

persons.name: Mathews
persons.context: Allegedly worked with Joe to mislead investors by presenting an unencumbered property; later accused of stealing, which caused others to ghost hotel servers.

persons.name: Joe
persons.context: Allegedly worked with Mathews to mislead would-be investors by not disclosing the property's mortgage status.

persons.name: Nick
persons.context: Mentioned in emails instructing him to withdraw funds from hotel funds to buy Mathews' property in CT through an LLC formed by Craig.

persons.name: Joe Black
persons.context: Along with Joe Walsh, approached GFS after the fact with written evidence because they were ghosting the servers at the hotel after discovering Mathews was stealing.

keyFacts: Attorneys CG and Les Evans allegedly colluded to delay filing a mortgage for six months, enabling Mathews and Joe to mislead investors into thinking a property was unencumbered.
Craig formed multiple LLCs, including one for a boat alibi to misappropriate funds from hotel/EB-5 investment funds and another to buy property behind the hotel.
Emails exist showing Craig instructed Nick to withdraw funds from hotel accounts to purchase Mathews' property in Connecticut through a specially formed LLC.
The scheme unraveled when Joe Black and Joe Walsh presented evidence to GFS after discovering Mathews was stealing, causing those involved to ghost the hotel servers.
